items.name: Divy - Expense Management App
items.description: A mobile app that allows you to split expenses with friends. All the functionality from leading expense split apps, but for free. Coming soon to the App and Play Store.

items.name: Wireless Ad-Hoc Network Controlled Rovers
items.description: A system of mobile wireless ad hoc network controlled rovers built using Arduino chipsets. Designed to demonstrate fast data transfers and energy efficiency for surveying areas where human intervention may not be possible. Research paper published in the International Journal of Computer Applications.
